metadata.title: CVE-2014-5247 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The _UpgradeBeforeConfigurationChange function in lib/client/gnt_cluster.pyin Ganeti 2.10.0 before 2.10.7 and 2.11.0 before 2.11.5 uses world-readablepermissions for the configuration backup file, which allows local users toobtain SSL keys, remote API credentials, and other sensitive information byreading the file, related to the upgrade command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ganeti - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-2.15 - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-haskell-2.15 - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-htools - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-htools-2.15 - 2.15.2-3
ganeti2 - 2.15.2-3
python-ganeti-rapi - 2.15.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ganeti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.15.2-3').
